definition: the occurrence of a sudden discharge, in particular of liquid, wet with a spurt of liquid
details:
noun
- the occurrence of a sudden discharge, in particular of liquid
= example: the occurrence of a sudden discharge, in particular of liquid
= synonyms: jet
- someone who is small and insignificant
= synonyms: small fry, pip-squeak
verb
- wet with a spurt of liquid
- to cause liquid to come out in a thin, fast stream
= example: to cause liquid to come out in a thin, fast stream
= synonyms: force out
